text: - We're willing to try out things
that maybe seem crazy, a little bit,
but they're not, you know, absurd,
they're just, never been done before.
And so that willingness to say hey, let's

try this out, let's see
if we can make this work.
I think that makes it a lot of fun.

And so there's an opportunity
to work on problems

that you just don't, I
don't think see in a lot
of other places in the world.
But I think that's exciting to me.
